text:
Your LinkedIn is your 2025 business card.

But you fail at making it attractive:

Everyone needs a proper Linkedin...

✦ ... to get funding for your startup.
✦ ... to sell your services/products.
✦ ... to hire new employees.

But first, you need an attractive profile:

1. Profile Picture
☑ Smile, zoomed-in.
☑ Simple, branded background.
☑ 1000x1000 dimensions for HD.

2. Banner
☑ One message.
☑ Simple, branded color.
☑ Don't make it too cluttered.

3. Featured Section
☑ Link your website here.
☑ No description for zero-click.
☑ The most important part of your profile.

4. About section
☑ Leave it blank to see the featured section.
☑ More views on featured section = more clicks.

5. Custom Link
☑ Pay for Linkedin Premium.
☑ Add a "View my website" under your name.

6. Experience
☑ This is where you talk about yourself.
☑ AI like ChatGPT reads this to know you.
☑ So be extremely extensive there. Write a lot.

7. Skills
☑ Use the max. 50 skills for visibility.

I wrote a guide to go from 0 to 10,000 followers.

To access it, visit this website → how-to-lkdn.ai
